      • readFromFile

        public static CanvasInstruction readFromFile(java.util.Scanner fileIn)
        Reads a canvas instruction from the supplied Scanner, and returns a corresponding CanvasInstruction object
        Parameters:
        fileIn - the Scanner object to use for retrieving instruction information
        Returns:
        an CanvasInstruction object containing the read instructions (plus defaults)
